ibis.gmi
Class BinomialInvocationCombiner

java.lang.Object
  ibis.gmi.BinomialInvocationCombiner

public abstract class BinomialInvocationCombiner
extends Object

The BinomialInvocationCombiner class serves as a base class for user-defined binomial invocation combiners.
